scripts.deploy:dev: cd cdk && npm run cdk -- deploy learn-aws-sqs-dev -c environment=dev
scripts.destroy:dev: cd cdk && npm run cdk -- destroy learn-aws-sqs-dev -c environment=dev
scripts.deploy-lambda:dev: cd cdk && npm run cdk -- deploy learn-aws-sqs-lambda-trigger-dev -c environment=dev
scripts.destroy-lambda:dev: cd cdk && npm run cdk -- destroy learn-aws-sqs-lambda-trigger-dev -c environment=dev
scripts.deploy-event:dev: cd cdk && npm run cdk -- deploy learn-aws-sqs-event-pipe-state-dev -c environment=dev
scripts.destroy-event:dev: cd cdk && npm run cdk -- destroy learn-aws-sqs-event-pipe-state-dev -c environment=dev
scripts.deploy-s3-sqs:dev: cd cdk && npm run cdk -- deploy learn-aws-sqs-s3-sqs-lambda-dev -c environment=dev
scripts.destroy-s3-sqs:dev: cd cdk && npm run cdk -- destroy learn-aws-sqs-s3-sqs-lambda-dev -c environment=dev
